registry.title: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol for IPv6 (DHCPv6)
registry.note: For the Civic Address Types Registry , please see: http://www.iana.org/assignments/civic-address-types-registry

registry.title: Option Codes
registry.expert: Ted Lemon, Bernie Volz, Tomek Mrugalski
registry.note: For the "Client ORO" column: a "Yes" for an option means that the client includes this option code in the Option Request option (see Section 21.7 of ) if it desires that configuration information; a "No" means that the option MUST NOT be included (and servers SHOULD silently ignore that option code if it appears in a client's Option Request option).
registry.footnote: For each enterprise-number, there MUST only be a single instance.
